cloud_init.user_data:
#cloud-config

users:
  - name: centos
    ssh-authorized-keys:
      - @@{CentOS_Creds.public_key}@@
    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']

preserve_hostname: false
fqdn: reposrv.test.local
hostname: reposrv

attrs.script:
# Adding user on the CloudImage for debugging the VM  - Debug User
sudo useradd nutanix
sudo printf "nutanix/4u" | sudo passwd "--stdin" nutanix
sudo usermod -aG wheel nutanix

sudo echo '
search ads.pnu.edu.sa
172.17.72.3
172.17.73.3
172.17.90.20' | sudo tee -a /etc/resolv.conf

# Update the server with the latest packages and install basic tools.
sudo yum update -y
sudo yum install vim httpd createrepo yum-utils parted -y

# Update the /etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf file with the basic configuratoins. 
sudo echo '
ServerRoot "/etc/httpd"
    Listen 80
    Include conf.modules.d/*.conf
    User apache
    Group apache
    ServerAdmin root@localhost
    
    <Directory />
        AllowOverride none
        Require all denied
    </Directory>
    
    DocumentRoot "/mnt/data/var/www/html"

    <Directory "/mnt/data/var/www">
        AllowOverride None
        Require all granted
    </Directory>

    <Directory "/mnt/data/var/www/html">
        Options Indexes FollowSymLinks
        AllowOverride None
        Require all granted
    </Directory>

    <IfModule dir_module>
        DirectoryIndex index.html
    </IfModule>

    <Files ".ht*">
        Require all denied
    </Files>

    ErrorLog "logs/error_log"
    LogLevel warn

    <IfModule log_config_module>
        LogFormat "%h %l %u %t \"%r\" %>s %b \"%{Referer}i\" \"%{User-Agent}i\"" combined
        LogFormat "%h %l %u %t \"%r\" %>s %b" common
        <IfModule logio_module>
          LogFormat "%h %l %u %t \"%r\" %>s %b \"%{Referer}i\" \"%{User-Agent}i\" %I %O" combinedio
        </IfModule>
        CustomLog "logs/access_log" combined
    </IfModule>

    <IfModule alias_module>
        ScriptAlias /cgi-bin/ "/mnt/data/var/www/cgi-bin/"
    </IfModule>

    <Directory "/mnt/data/var/www/cgi-bin">
        AllowOverride None
        Options None
        Require all granted
    </Directory>

    <IfModule mime_module>
        TypesConfig /etc/mime.types
        AddType application/x-compress .Z
        AddType application/x-gzip .gz .tgz
        AddType text/html .shtml
        AddOutputFilter INCLUDES .shtml
    </IfModule>

    AddDefaultCharset UTF-8

    <IfModule mime_magic_module>
        MIMEMagicFile conf/magic
    </IfModule>

    EnableSendfile on
    IncludeOptional conf.d/*.conf' | sudo tee /etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf

# Disable SELinux 
sudo sed -i 's/SELINUX=enforcing/SELINUX=disabled/g' /etc/selinux/config
sudo setenforce 0

# Formatting and Partitioning disk for storing the Linux Packages which the clients will use for package management. 
sudo parted /dev/sdb mklabel gpt
sudo parted -a opt /dev/sdb mkpart primary ext4 0% 100%
sudo mkfs.ext4 -L datapartition /dev/sdb1
sudo mkdir -p /mnt/data
sudo mount -o defaults /dev/sdb1 /mnt/data
sudo echo 'LABEL=datapartition /mnt/data ext4 defaults 0 2' | sudo tee -a /etc/fstab

# Create Directories for each repo.
sudo mkdir -p /mnt/data/var/www/html/repos/base
sudo mkdir -p /mnt/data/var/www/html/repos/centosplus
sudo mkdir -p /mnt/data/var/www/html/repos/extras
sudo mkdir -p /mnt/data/var/www/html/repos/updates
sudo mkdir -p /mnt/data/var/www/cgi-bin

# Start the HTTPd services and enable on every startup.
sudo systemctl start httpd
sudo systemctl enable httpd

# Sync repo from the Internet and create the repo DB. 
sudo reposync -g -l -d -m --repoid=base --newest-only --download-metadata --download_path=/mnt/data/var/www/html/repos/
sudo reposync -g -l -d -m --repoid=centosplus --newest-only --download-metadata --download_path=/mnt/data/var/www/html/repos/
sudo reposync -g -l -d -m --repoid=extras --newest-only --download-metadata --download_path=/mnt/data/var/www/html/repos/
sudo reposync -g -l -d -m --repoid=updates --newest-only --download-metadata --download_path=/mnt/data/var/www/html/repos/
sudo createrepo /mnt/data/var/www/html

attrs.script:
# Adding user on the CloudImage for debugging the VM  - Debug User
sudo useradd nutanix
sudo printf "nutanix/4u" | sudo passwd "--stdin" nutanix
sudo usermod -aG wheel nutanix

# Update DNS on the /etc/resolv.conf
sudo echo '
search ads.pnu.edu.sa
172.17.72.3
172.17.73.3
172.17.90.20' | sudo tee -a /etc/resolv.conf

# Disable SELinux 
sudo sed -i 's/SELINUX=enforcing/SELINUX=disabled/g' /etc/selinux/config
sudo setenforce 0

sudo mkdir /etc/yum.repos.d/old_repos
sudo mv /etc/yum.repos.d/*.repo /etc/yum.repos.d/old_repos

# Configure the remote server repo for the clients.
sudo echo '
[remote]
name=RHEL Apache
baseurl=http://@@{RepoServer.address}@@
enabled=1
gpgcheck=0' | sudo tee -a /etc/yum.repos.d/remote.repo

sudo yum repolist
sudo yum install tree vim -y
sudo yum info tree

status.name: ss_Linux_Repo_BP

spec.description: This is a Linux Repo BP to setup a Linux repo server and integrate clients with the remote repo server.

#cloud-config

users:
  - name: centos
    ssh-authorized-keys:
      - @@{CentOS_Creds.public_key}@@
    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']

preserve_hostname: false
fqdn: reposrv.test.local
hostname: reposrv

hostname: repoclient

attrs.script:
# Adding user on the CloudImage for debugging the VM  - Debug User
sudo useradd nutanix
sudo printf "nutanix/4u" | sudo passwd "--stdin" nutanix
sudo usermod -aG wheel nutanix

sudo echo '
search ads.pnu.edu.sa
172.17.72.3
172.17.73.3
172.17.90.20' | sudo tee -a /etc/resolv.conf

# Update the server with the latest packages and install basic tools.
sudo yum update -y
sudo yum install vim httpd createrepo yum-utils parted -y

# Update the /etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf file with the basic configuratoins. 
sudo echo '
ServerRoot "/etc/httpd"
    Listen 80
    Include conf.modules.d/*.conf
    User apache
    Group apache
    ServerAdmin root@localhost
    
    <Directory />
        AllowOverride none
        Require all denied
    </Directory>
    
    DocumentRoot "/mnt/data/var/www/html"

    <Directory "/mnt/data/var/www">
        AllowOverride None
        Require all granted
    </Directory>

    <Directory "/mnt/data/var/www/html">
        Options Indexes FollowSymLinks
        AllowOverride None
        Require all granted
    </Directory>

    <IfModule dir_module>
        DirectoryIndex index.html
    </IfModule>

    <Files ".ht*">
        Require all denied
    </Files>

    ErrorLog "logs/error_log"
    LogLevel warn

    <IfModule log_config_module>
        LogFormat "%h %l %u %t \"%r\" %>s %b \"%{Referer}i\" \"%{User-Agent}i\"" combined
        LogFormat "%h %l %u %t \"%r\" %>s %b" common
        <IfModule logio_module>
          LogFormat "%h %l %u %t \"%r\" %>s %b \"%{Referer}i\" \"%{User-Agent}i\" %I %O" combinedio
        </IfModule>
        CustomLog "logs/access_log" combined
    </IfModule>

    <IfModule alias_module>
        ScriptAlias /cgi-bin/ "/mnt/data/var/www/cgi-bin/"
    </IfModule>

    <Directory "/mnt/data/var/www/cgi-bin">
        AllowOverride None
        Options None
        Require all granted
    </Directory>

    <IfModule mime_module>
        TypesConfig /etc/mime.types
        AddType application/x-compress .Z
        AddType application/x-gzip .gz .tgz
        AddType text/html .shtml
        AddOutputFilter INCLUDES .shtml
    </IfModule>

    AddDefaultCharset UTF-8

    <IfModule mime_magic_module>
        MIMEMagicFile conf/magic
    </IfModule>

    EnableSendfile on
    IncludeOptional conf.d/*.conf' | sudo tee /etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf

# Disable SELinux 
sudo sed -i 's/SELINUX=enforcing/SELINUX=disabled/g' /etc/selinux/config
sudo setenforce 0

# Formatting and Partitioning disk for storing the Linux Packages which the clients will use for package management. 
sudo parted /dev/sdb mklabel gpt
sudo parted -a opt /dev/sdb mkpart primary ext4 0% 100%
sudo mkfs.ext4 -L datapartition /dev/sdb1
sudo mkdir -p /mnt/data
sudo mount -o defaults /dev/sdb1 /mnt/data
sudo echo 'LABEL=datapartition /mnt/data ext4 defaults 0 2' | sudo tee -a /etc/fstab

# Create Directories for each repo.
sudo mkdir -p /mnt/data/var/www/html/repos/base
sudo mkdir -p /mnt/data/var/www/html/repos/centosplus
sudo mkdir -p /mnt/data/var/www/html/repos/extras
sudo mkdir -p /mnt/data/var/www/html/repos/updates
sudo mkdir -p /mnt/data/var/www/cgi-bin

# Start the HTTPd services and enable on every startup.
sudo systemctl start httpd
sudo systemctl enable httpd

# Sync repo from the Internet and create the repo DB. 
sudo reposync -g -l -d -m --repoid=base --newest-only --download-metadata --download_path=/mnt/data/var/www/html/repos/
sudo reposync -g -l -d -m --repoid=centosplus --newest-only --download-metadata --download_path=/mnt/data/var/www/html/repos/
sudo reposync -g -l -d -m --repoid=extras --newest-only --download-metadata --download_path=/mnt/data/var/www/html/repos/
sudo reposync -g -l -d -m --repoid=updates --newest-only --download-metadata --download_path=/mnt/data/var/www/html/repos/
sudo createrepo /mnt/data/var/www/html

# Adding user on the CloudImage for debugging the VM  - Debug User
sudo useradd nutanix
sudo printf "nutanix/4u" | sudo passwd "--stdin" nutanix
sudo usermod -aG wheel nutanix

# Update DNS on the /etc/resolv.conf
sudo echo '
search ads.pnu.edu.sa
172.17.72.3
172.17.73.3
172.17.90.20' | sudo tee -a /etc/resolv.conf

# Disable SELinux 
sudo sed -i 's/SELINUX=enforcing/SELINUX=disabled/g' /etc/selinux/config
sudo setenforce 0

sudo mkdir /etc/yum.repos.d/old_repos
sudo mv /etc/yum.repos.d/*.repo /etc/yum.repos.d/old_repos

# Configure the remote server repo for the clients.
sudo echo '
[remote]
name=RHEL Apache
baseurl=http://@@{RepoServer.address}@@
enabled=1
gpgcheck=0' | sudo tee -a /etc/yum.repos.d/remote.repo

sudo yum repolist
sudo yum install tree vim -y
sudo yum info tree

spec.name: ss_Linux_Repo_BP
